tourBios.exmtStatus: Exempt - Finished 11-45 at 2015 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament (exempt to second reshuffle)
tourBios.curYearHigh: Earned his first top-10 on Tour in Lafayette at the Chitimacha Louisiana Open. Carded 69-66 and was tied for 16th after 36 holes. Fell to a tie for 19th after the third round, with an even-par 71. Entered the final round five back and climbed to within two of the lead after going out in 31. Struggled coming in and recorded three bogeys for a Sunday 68 and a T7 showing.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Four-time All-American (two-time first-team selection) at the University of Washington, where he recorded eight wins...Was named a finalist for the Ben Hogan Award in 2015 and finished second individually at the NCAA Championships.
tourBios.personal: Favorite pro sports' team is the Seattle Seahawks...Dream foursome would include Luke Donald, Adam Scott and Gary Player...Favorite course he's played is The Olympic Club. Wants to play Augusta National...Served in the Chinese Taipei military in August 2015...Twitter handle is @ctpan63.

tourBios.curYrHigh: Earned his first top-10 on Tour in Lafayette at the Chitimacha Louisiana Open. Carded 69-66 and was tied for 16th after 36 holes. Fell to a tie for 19th after the third round, with an even-par 71. Entered the final round five back and climbed to within two of the lead after going out in 31. Struggled coming in and recorded three bogeys for a Sunday 68 and a T7 showing.
tourBios.carHigh: 2015: With rounds of 67-71-73-68, finished T5 at the Canada Qualifying Tournament earning exempt status through the first six events...Made his professional debut at the U.S. Open, where he made the cut and finished T64...Played the Travelers Championship the following week on a sponsor's exemption and finished T25...Made his Mackenzie Tour debut at the SIGA Dakota Dunes Open to T26...Entered the final round of The Players Cup three shots off the lead but fired a final-round, 5-under 66 to win his first professional event by two shots...Departed to his native Chinese Taipei after the Staal Foundation Open to serve 12 days in the military...Returned to the Mackenzie Tour at The Great Waterway Classic, opening with an 8-under 64 to share the first-round lead before finishing T11...Finished T3 at The Wildfire Invitational, thanks to rounds of 64-68-68-68...Birdied the final five holes, including a chip-in at the 18th, to get into a playoff at the Cape Breton Celtic Classic, defeating Taylor Pendrith on the second extra hole...Finished second on the Order of Merit to earn Web.com Tour status for 2016.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Four-time All-American (two-time first team) at the University of Washington, where he recorded eight wins...Was named a finalist for the Ben Hogan Award in 2015 and finished second individually at the NCAA Championships.
tourBios.personal: Favorite pro sports' team is the Seattle Seahawks...Dream foursome would include Luke Donald, Adam Scott and Gary Player...Favorite course he's played is The Olympic Club. Wants to play Augusta National...Served in the Taiwanese Military in August of 2015...Twitter handle is @ctpan63.

tourBios.curYearHigh: Earned his first top-10 on Tour in Lafayette at the Chitimacha Louisiana Open. Carded 69-66 and was tied for 16th after 36 holes. Fell to a tie for 19th after the third round, with an even-par 71. Entered the final round five back and climbed to within two of the lead after going out in 31. Struggled coming in and recorded three bogeys for a Sunday 68 and a T7 showing.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour in 2016 is T7th at the Chitimacha Louisiana Open presented by NACHER.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 2nd in Scoring Average (Actual) on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
